name: Yemek Sepeti - Dark Theme
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://www.yemeksepeti.com") {
header .top {
    background-color: #222;
    background-image: linear-gradient(#222, #222)!important;
}
body {
    background-color: #222;
    color: #ccc;
}
.ys-btn.ys-btn-default[disabled],
.ys-btn.ys-btn-default[disabled=disabled] {
    color: #333;
}
footer .top,
header .inner .container .form .search-box,
#gamification-activity-widget .panel-body,
#colorbox.ys-colorbox #cboxLoadedContent,
#colorbox.ys-colorbox .colorbox-content,
#order-status-popup.order-Prepairing .order-status-popup-top,
#order-status-popup.order-OnTheWay .order-status-popup-top,
.jokerOffersContainer .jokerFooter,
.jokerContainer .jokerFooter,
.panel,
.ys-main,
.ys-userComp .ys-userInfo,
.ys-panel > .panel-heading,
.ys-panel,
.ys-panel-flat,
.ys-areaSelector-dropdown .select2-result-label,
.nav-tabs,
.nav-tabs li a,
.ys-userComp .ys-userDetails .ys-userActions,
.form-control,
.area-selector.select2-container .select2-choice .select2-chosen,
.category-name.recent-searches,
.recent-search-item,
.ys-po-item,
.ys-tooltip,
.ys-panel-clean,
.ys-btn.ys-btn-info,
.table > caption + thead > tr:first-child > th,
.ys-checkout .row .row .ys-table > caption + thead > tr:first-child > th,
.ys-checkoutInfo .row .row .ys-table > caption + thead > tr:first-child > th,
.table > caption + thead > tr:first-child > td,
.ys-checkout .row .row .ys-table > caption + thead > tr:first-child > td,
.ys-checkoutInfo .row .row .ys-table > caption + thead > tr:first-child > td,
.table > colgroup + thead > tr:first-child > th,
.ys-checkout .row .row .ys-table > colgroup + thead > tr:first-child > th,
.ys-checkoutInfo .row .row .ys-table > colgroup + thead > tr:first-child > th,
.table > colgroup + thead > tr:first-child > td,
.ys-checkout .row .row .ys-table > colgroup + thead > tr:first-child > td,
.ys-checkoutInfo .row .row .ys-table > colgroup + thead > tr:first-child > td,
.table > thead:first-child > tr:first-child > th,
.ys-checkout .row .row .ys-table > thead:first-child > tr:first-child > th,
.ys-checkoutInfo .row .row .ys-table > thead:first-child > tr:first-child > th,
.table > thead:first-child > tr:first-child > td,
.ys-checkout .row .row .ys-table > thead:first-child > tr:first-child > td,
.ys-checkoutInfo .row .row .ys-table > thead:first-child > tr:first-child > td,
.ys-checkout .row .row .ys-table .tdOrderCount input,
.ys-checkoutInfo .row .row .ys-table .tdOrderCount input,
.ys-checkout .row .row .ys-table tfoot tr .tdCoupons input,
.ys-checkoutInfo .row .row .ys-table tfoot tr .tdCoupons input,
.ys-restaurantDetail #restaurantDetail .restaurantDetailBox > .head.white,
.campus-restaurants #restaurantDetail .restaurantDetailBox > .head.white,
.ys-restaurantDetail .campus-restaurants .campus-restaurant-list .restaurantDetailBox > .head.white,
.campus-restaurants .ys-restaurantDetail .campus-restaurant-list .restaurantDetailBox > .head.white,
.campus-restaurants .campus-restaurant-list .restaurantDetailBox > .head.white,
.ys-restaurantDetailNew #restaurantDetail .restaurant-tabs:not(.restaurant-properties) .panel-body #restaurant_info.tab .restaurantDetailBox > .head,
.ys-restaurantDetailNew .campus-restaurants .campus-restaurant-list .restaurant-tabs:not(.restaurant-properties) .panel-body #restaurant_info.tab .restaurantDetailBox > .head,
.campus-restaurants .ys-restaurantDetailNew .campus-restaurant-list .restaurant-tabs:not(.restaurant-properties) .panel-body #restaurant_info.tab .restaurantDetailBox > .head,
.ys-restaurantDetail .comments .comments-header,
.ys-checkoutInfo .row.panel-shadow,
.ys-checkoutInfo .checkoutInfoAddress .address-item .detail,
.campus-restaurants .comments .comments-header,
.campus-restaurants .ys-result-count p,
.campus-restaurants .campus-restaurant-list .campus-restaurants-item .listBody .pagination > li > a,
.campus-restaurants .campus-restaurant-list .campus-restaurants-item .listBody,
.pagination > li > span,
.popover,
.filter {
    background-color: #222!important;
}
footer .top,
footer .bottom .container,
hr,
.ys-userComp .ys-userInfo,
.ys-basket .itemList table tbody tr td.item-count input,
.ys-basket .noItem,
.ys-panel.ys-panel-blue,
.ys-panel.ys-pnlUserBar #order-history .repeat-order-button,
.ys-panel.ys-pnlUserBar #order-history .comment-button,
.ys-panel-flat,
.ys-panel.ys-panel-big-white,
.ys-tooltip,
.ys-basket .total,
.ys-basket .itemList,
.ys-checkout .row .row .ys-table .tdOrderCount input,
.ys-checkoutInfo .row .row .ys-table .tdOrderCount input,
.nav-tabs > li.active > a,
.nav-tabs > li.active > a:hover,
.nav-tabs > li.active > a:focus,
.ys-checkout .row .row .ys-table tfoot tr .tdCoupons input,
.ys-checkoutInfo .row .row .ys-table tfoot tr .tdCoupons input,
.ys-input-xs {
    border-color: #333;
}
.nav-tabs li a:hover {
    background-color: #777!important;
}
#order-status-popup .order-status-popup-order-info ul li {
    border-color: #777;
}
input[type='text'],
input[type='password'],
input[type='number'],
input[type='email'],
#gamification-activity-widget .singlePlayer.latestActivityEmpty,
.select2-drop,
.ys-s2-dropdown .select2-choice,
.area-selector.select2-container .select2-choice .select2-arrow,
.select2-results .select2-no-results,
.select2-results .select2-searching,
.select2-results .select2-ajax-error,
.select2-results .select2-selection-limit,
.area-selector.select2-container .select2-choice,
.ys-checkout .row .row.checkoutPaymentTypes .onlinePayments > b,
.ys-checkout .row .row.checkoutPaymentTypes .otherPayments > b,
.ys-checkoutInfo .row .row.checkoutPaymentTypes .onlinePayments > b,
.ys-checkoutInfo .row .row.checkoutPaymentTypes .otherPayments > b,
.ys-panel.ys-panel-big-white > .panel-heading .nav-tabs li.active a,
.ys-panel.ys-panel-big-white > .panel-heading .nav-tabs li:hover a,
.ys-checkoutInfo .panel-shadow .header,
.ys-btn.ys-btn-info,
.upsell-container #upsell-wrapper,
.upsell-container .header,
.upsell-container #upsell-slider,
.address-item .header,
.ys-restaurantDetail #restaurantDetail .restaurantDetailBox,
.campus-restaurants #restaurantDetail .restaurantDetailBox,
.ys-restaurantDetail .campus-restaurants .campus-restaurant-list .restaurantDetailBox,
.campus-restaurants .ys-restaurantDetail .campus-restaurant-list .restaurantDetailBox,
.campus-restaurants .campus-restaurant-list .restaurantDetailBox,
.ui-widget-content {
    background: #222!important;
}
#order-status-popup .order-status-popup-order-info .order-status-popup-order-info-wrapper,
#order-status-popup .order-status-popup-order-info ul,
.address-list .address.address.active .detail,
.ys-restaurantDetail #restaurantDetail .restaurantDetailBox .listBody ul > li:hover,
.campus-restaurants #restaurantDetail .restaurantDetailBox .listBody ul > li:hover,
.ys-restaurantDetail .campus-restaurants .campus-restaurant-list .restaurantDetailBox .listBody ul > li:hover,
.campus-restaurants .ys-restaurantDetail .campus-restaurant-list .restaurantDetailBox .listBody ul > li:hover,
.campus-restaurants .campus-restaurant-list .restaurantDetailBox .listBody ul > li:hover,
.ys-left-filter .header,
.ys-left-filter .header {
    background: #333;
}
.ys-basket .location,
.nav-tabs li.active a,
.ys-basket .actions,
.ys-checkout .row .row.checkoutPaymentTypes .onlinePayments .payments .radio.active,
.ys-checkout .row .row.checkoutPaymentTypes .otherPayments .payments .radio.active,
.ys-checkoutInfo .row .row.checkoutPaymentTypes .onlinePayments .payments .radio.active,
.ys-checkoutInfo .row .row.checkoutPaymentTypes .otherPayments .payments .radio.active,
.ys-checkout .row .row.checkoutDetails .ys-panel-clean .panel-body ul li:first-child,
.ys-checkoutInfo .row .row.checkoutDetails .ys-panel-clean .panel-body ul li:first-child {
    background-color: #333!important;
}
.ys-miniCuzdan.noAccount {
    background-color: #DDD;
    -webkit-filter: invert(100%);
    filter: invert(100%);
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
}
input[type='text'],
input[type='password'],
input[type='number'],
input[type='email'],
.ys-userComp .ys-userInfo .ys-pullRight > div,
.ys-userComp .ys-userInfo .ys-basket .header > ul > div,
.ys-userComp .ys-userDetails .ys-userSettings ul li a,
.ys-basket .ys-userComp .ys-userInfo .header > ul > div,
.ys-panel > .panel-heading,
.ys-panel-flat > .panel-heading,
.ys-panel.ys-pnlUserBar .panel-body > .tab .ys-po-item .popoverInfo > a span:first-child,
.ys-panel.ys-pnlUserBar #order-history .repeat-order-button,
.ys-panel.ys-pnlUserBar #order-history .comment-button,
.ys-panel.ys-SavedAddress ul li a,
.ys-panel.ys-pnlUserBar .panel-body > .tab .ys-po-item > a,
.ys-panel.ys-pnlUserBar .panel-body > .tab .ys-po-item .popoverInfo > a,
.ys-checkout .row .row .ys-table .tdOrderName span,
.ys-checkoutInfo .row .row .ys-table .tdOrderName span,
.ys-checkout .row .row .ys-table tbody tr .tdOrderName,
.ys-checkoutInfo .row .row .ys-table tbody tr .tdOrderName,
.ys-pagination .ys-reslist-page li a,
.ys-pagination .ys-reslist-page li a:hover,
.ys-pagination .ys-commentlist-page li a,
.ys-pagination .ys-commentlist-page li a:hover,
.ys-input-xs,
.ys-RestaurantList .ys-reslist-items .ys-item .head a,
.campus-restaurants .campus-restaurant-list .ys-reslist-items .ys-item .head a,
.ys-RestaurantList .ys-promoted-reslist-items .ys-item .head a,
.campus-restaurants .campus-restaurant-list .ys-promoted-reslist-items .ys-item .head a,
.jokerOffersContainer .jokerFooter .counter span:first-child,
.jokerContainer .jokerFooter .counter span:first-child,
.jokerOffersContainer .jokerOffers .jokerOfferItemsContainer .joker-offer .joker-offer-item .restaurantDisplayName,
.jokerOffersContainer .endingWarning .jokerOfferItemsContainer .joker-offer .joker-offer-item .restaurantDisplayName,
.jokerOffersContainer .exitWarning .jokerOfferItemsContainer .joker-offer .joker-offer-item .restaurantDisplayName,
.jokerContainer .jokerOffers .jokerOfferItemsContainer .joker-offer .joker-offer-item .restaurantDisplayName,
.jokerContainer .endingWarning .jokerOfferItemsContainer .joker-offer .joker-offer-item .restaurantDisplayName,
.jokerContainer .exitWarning .jokerOfferItemsContainer .joker-offer .joker-offer-item .restaurantDisplayName,
.select2-container .select2-choice,
.select2-drop,
.panel-default > .panel-heading,
.nav-tabs li.active a,
.nav-tabs li a,
#order-status-popup .order-status-popup-restaurant-info .arrival-time,
#order-status-popup .order-status-popup-order-info ul li,
#order-status-popup .order-status-popup-top,
.upsell-container #upsell-slider .food .upsell-item .product-name a,
.restaurant-point-result p,
.option-checkboxes label,
.campus-restaurants .ys-result-count p,
.ys-productDetails .exclude-label,
.ys-productDetails .excludes a {
    color: #ccc!important;
}
.ys-panel.ys-SavedAddress,
.ys-panel.ys-pnlUserBar {
    border-bottom: 35px solid #333;
    border-right-color: #333;
    border-left-color: #333;
    border-top-color: #333;
}
footer .top .changeLanguage a span.selectEnglishTitle,
.ys-panel.ys-panel-big-white > .panel-heading.with-tabs .nav-tabs li a:hover,
a:hover,
a:active {
    color: #337ab7!important;
}
audio,
canvas,
progress,
video,
.ys-panel > .panel-heading .ys-icons,
.ys-panel > .panel-heading .bx-wrapper .bx-controls .bx-controls-direction .bx-prev,
.bx-wrapper .bx-controls .bx-controls-direction .ys-panel > .panel-heading .bx-prev,
.ys-panel > .panel-heading .bx-wrapper .bx-controls .bx-controls-direction .bx-next,
.bx-wrapper .bx-controls .bx-controls-direction .ys-panel > .panel-heading .bx-next,
.ys-panel > .panel-heading #colorbox.ys-colorbox #cboxClose,
#colorbox.ys-colorbox .ys-panel > .panel-heading #cboxClose,
.ys-panel > .panel-heading #colorbox.ys-colorbox .close-button,
#colorbox.ys-colorbox .ys-panel > .panel-heading .close-button,
.ys-panel > .panel-heading #cuzdanSettings .cuzdanSettingsPanel .cuzdanSettingsSidebar .sidebarTab .icon,
#cuzdanSettings .cuzdanSettingsPanel .cuzdanSettingsSidebar .sidebarTab .ys-panel > .panel-heading .icon,
.ys-userComp .ys-userInfo .ys-pullRight > div:before,
.ys-userComp .ys-userInfo .ys-basket .header > ul > div:before,
.ys-basket .ys-userComp .ys-userInfo .header > ul > div:before,

.ys-panel.ys-pnlUserBar .panel-body > .tab .ys-po-item .actions a.repeat-order-button .bx-wrapper .bx-controls .bx-controls-direction .bx-next,

.ys-panel.ys-pnlUserBar .panel-body > .tab .ys-po-item .actions a.repeat-order-button #colorbox.ys-colorbox #cboxClose,
#colorbox.ys-colorbox .ys-panel.ys-pnlUserBar .panel-body > .tab .ys-po-item .actions a.repeat-order-button #cboxClose,
.ys-panel.ys-pnlUserBar .panel-body > .tab .ys-po-item .actions a.repeat-order-button #colorbox.ys-colorbox .close-button,

.ys-panel.ys-SavedAddress .panel-body:not(.areaSelectTestB) ul li div i,
.ys-checkout .row .row.checkoutAddress .btnAddAddress,
.ys-checkoutInfo .row .row.checkoutAddress .btnAddAddress,
.address-list .address .header .addressIcon,
.ys-left-filter .filter .ys-icons,
.ys-left-filter .filter .bx-wrapper .bx-controls .bx-controls-direction .bx-prev,
.bx-wrapper .bx-controls .bx-controls-direction .ys-left-filter .filter .bx-prev,
.ys-left-filter .filter .bx-wrapper .bx-controls .bx-controls-direction .bx-next,

.ys-left-filter .filter #colorbox.ys-colorbox .close-button,
